v-model:active.description: Whether to activate the action menu

drag.description: Drag component props, for deep customization (support direction attraction boundary)
drag.description_zh: 拖拽组件道具，进行深度定制（支持方向吸引边界）

type.description: type, optional values are default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: type，可选值为默认主信息成功警告危险

position.description: trigger position, optional values are left-top right-top left-bottom right-bottom
position.description_zh: 触发位置，可选值为左-上-右-上-左-下-右-下

direction.description: Action menu popup direction, optional values are top bottom left right
direction.description_zh: 操作菜单弹出方向，可选值为上、左下、右下

trigger.description_zh: 触发方法 点击悬停

inactive-icon-size.description_zh: 非活动触发器图标大小

inactive-icon-namespace.description_zh: 非活动时触发图标命名空间

active-icon-namespace.description_zh: 活动时触发图标命名空间

fixed.description: Whether to use fixed positioning, set to false to enable absolute positioning (absolute positioning prohibited from dragging)
fixed.description_zh: 是否使用固定定位，设置为 false 开启绝对定位（绝对定位禁止拖动）

z-index.description: Same as css z-index, used for custom trigger level
z-index.description_zh: 与 css z-index 相同，用于自定义触发级别

top.description: Same as css top, for custom trigger position
top.description_zh: 与 css top 相同，用于自定义触发位置

bottom.description: Same as css bottom, for custom trigger position
bottom.description_zh: 与 css bottom 相同，用于自定义触发位置

left.description: Same as css left, for custom trigger position
left.description_zh: 与 css left 相同，用于自定义触发位置

right.description: Same as css right, for custom trigger position
right.description_zh: 与 css right 相同，用于自定义触发位置

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否启用底部安全区域适配

teleport.description: element to which the component mounts

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false 和 0-24 级别

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the trigger is clicked, not triggered when disabled state is true
events.description_zh: 单击触发器时触发，禁用状态为 true 时不触发

events.name: open
events.description: Fires when the action menu is activated and opened
events.description_zh: 激活并打开操作菜单时触发

events.name: opened
events.description: Fires at the end of the animation that activates and opens the action menu
events.description_zh: 在动画结束时触发，激活并打开操作菜单

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the action menu is deactivated and closed
events.description_zh: 在停用和关闭操作菜单时触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Fires when the animation of inactivating and closing the action menu ends
events.description_zh: 当停用和关闭操作菜单的动画结束时触发
